name: Atsushi Togo
body:
![thalys](/thalys.jpg =160x80)

### Affiliation
Program-Specific Associate Professor at [ESISM](http://esism.kyoto-u.ac.jp/en/index.html), Kyoto university

### Research interest
* Anharmonicity of crystals
* Transition pathway search of crystal-structural phases

### Software development
* [phonopy](http://phonopy.sourceforge.net/) : Phonon calculator and analyzer written in Python
* [spglib](http://spglib.sourceforge.net/): Crsytal symmetry finder written in C
* [qsushi](http://qsushi.sourceforge.net/) : Automation environment for crystal simulations written in Python
